enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
section_title: CAPACITY BUILDING IN COUNTRIES WITH ECONOMIES IN TRANSITION:
sentences: The SBI considered this item in plenary on 4 December (FCCC/SBI/2007/18).
The matter was then referred to a contact group co-chaired by Helmut Hojesky (Austria) and Vlad Trusca (Romania).
The group developed short draft conclusions that were adopted by the SBI on 11 December.
